DocAttribute.Name: SpecificHeatCapacity
DocAttribute.Documentation: Defines the specific heat of the material: heat energy absorbed per temperature unit. Usually measured in [J/kg K].

DocAttribute.Name: BoilingPoint
DocAttribute.Documentation: The boiling point of the material (fluid). Usually measured in Kelvin.

DocAttribute.Name: FreezingPoint
DocAttribute.Documentation: The freezing point of the material (fluid). Usually measured in Kelvin.

DocAttribute.Name: ThermalConductivity
DocAttribute.Documentation: The rate at which thermal energy is transmitted through the material.Usually in [W/m K].
